specsKey: Nikon Coolpix L610 Point & Shoot Camera

pros: best feature is uses 2 aa batteries can be available anywhere grip of camera is too good to take photos without using other hand picture quality is also very good optical zoom is very good to take clear photos from large distance cons: slow processing in playback mode eat too much battery but i bought extra batteries to make my camera always ON & i use PC to check captured photos, so overall i liked it very much. if you are buying a travel zoom camera then it is the best option in 10k range

Things I Like : The optical zoom is very good, better than I imagined. There is a good variety of scene ( Picture mode) selections, which are excellent. Clarity of photos are good. I do not like: The camera takes a longer time to record the image after exposure. The case is same when a frame is deleted. Even though, I would recommend one to buy it.The camera is a good choice between a base model and an SLR.

The time is over to look after and search the best camera in cool price. This camera is best in its style, performance, photo and video quality. I love its shape. I love its zoom. This cam will give u the exact what u expected as camera should be in such price. It is very easy to handle and very easy in its function. Fully automatic for home users.

very cute and nice to handle. resolution is excellent. i am very much satisfied with the packing and delivery of the camera. very cheap compared to other brands and more features. great......................./

I got the delivery within 24hrs... That's just amazing....!!!! The camera is good....images are very clear and very nice optical zoom... also two pairs of battery and a free battery charger makes the deal just unavoidable. just grab it...

Guys if you want to have a camera for family / party / small functions & your personal use this is the best buy. Go for it guys. And about the features, all I can say is it the most user friendly camera I have seen. All in all a fantastic camera with all the accessories included :-))

Hi Guys, this is one of the best cameras you get at 13K. Pros: -Its Camera quality n zoom. -The packaged Li-MH batteries can take 300+ shots per pair. And you are provided with 2 pairs...so its freaking awesum. -Connectivity options are good. USB, AV, HDMI - Preset modes really work well like Panaroma, fireworks, sports, etc Cons: - It very rarely hangs (happened only once)

The camera features a variety of specs as given which is truly satisfy a beginner. The main bad thing of this camera is only the alkaline batteries which lacks performance as expected. But thats not a big deal. I must recommend it to the beginners.

good camera for outdoors, not for ones who need low light shooting without flash good batteries that come with camera i buy on 28 dec 2012 hd videos are awesum batteries on full charge give upto 200-300 shots per pair

Good one..... only concern is battery.....Other than that rest all features are good.... I like it.....again its my point of view...Please go ahead and do research before you buy any product....Reviews does help but not always... nowadays we are so used to reviews that even we go for movies after reading reviews which is not good at all... search for different products and choose the best....
